titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1947-12-06 - Minnie Pearl performance - WSM

mods.abstract: Excerpts from a Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 6, 1947. Featuring Red Foley (announcer) and Minnie Pearl on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
